mecard.util

Class Address2

  • java.lang.Object
    • mecard.util.Address2

  • public class Address2
extends java.lang.Object
    Address2 replaces Address and provides a robust method of parsing address strings typically produced by SIP2. The algorithm typically works on string in the form of 1234 56 Ave. St. Albert, AB T6Y 8M7 780-343-9908, but is designed to be flexible enough to able to identify variations on each field and even if some of the fields are missing or damaged.
    Author:
    Andrew Nisbet

      protected class  Address2.Province
      Utility class for testing strings for possible Canadian province names.
      protected class  Address2.Street
      Utility class for testing street strings.
